caption.p: Ecological niche model and uncertainty maps of natural Wolbachia infections in the host Aedes albopictus in México . ( a) Ecological niche model of natural Wolbachia infections in México. ( b) Extrapolation risk in projecting the Wolbachia model from the calibration area to a projection area (mobility-oriented parity (MOP) 10%). ( c) Standard deviation map; ( d) Uncertainty map of Wolbachia prediction model.
